short_summary: The Royal Canadian Navy is seeking Request for Proposals for RIMPAC Accommodations.
description: The Royal Canadian Navy \ (RCN) \ is seeking Proposals for the provision of Accommodations for personnel deploying to the Greater Honolulu Area to participate in the RIMPAC exercise in June, July, and August 2024. \ Proposals should be submitted \ via electronic tendering system by the closing date and time indicated in the solicitation. \ The Proposers \ are required to \ demonstrate satisfactory performance of the proposed service. \ Proposals must be received no later \ than 2:00 pm Hawaii-Aleutian Standard \ Time (HST) on the date indicated for closing on \ the solicitation.

# Government Tender Announcement

## Official Request for Proposal (RFP)

The Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) is soliciting bids for a Request for Proposal (RFP) service provision in the Greater Honolulu Area, HI, USA.

### Tender Details

* **RFx ID:** [W8484-24-0656](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37507/w8484-24-0656---rfp-amd-1_0.pdf)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Open Bidding)
* **Publication Date:** May 2, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 17, 2024, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 12, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** August 12, 2024

### RFP Description

The CAF is seeking service providers to offer accommodations and hotel amenities for a period of six weeks in the Greater Honolulu Area, HI, USA.

The service delivery period will commence on June 12, 2024 and end on August 12, 2024. The accommodation services are required to support the CAF deployment in the Honolulu/Waikiki area, HI, USA for participation in the Rim of the Pacific (RIMPAC) 2024 exercise.

### Key Requirements

* Provision of accommodations and hotel amenities
* Service delivery period: June 12, 2024 to August 12, 2024
* Service delivery location: Greater Honolulu Area, HI, USA
